versions.name: Avatar Toolkit 0.2.1 Alpha 2
versions.description:
Avatar Toolkit is currently in ALPHA. Expect bugs and issues during this early development phase.

Alpha 2 brings significant improvements with features designed to streamline your avatar creation workflow:

versions.warning: Avatar Toolkit includes an armature validation system. Some tools require either a standard armature or validation to be disabled.
